page.title: 10Employment around Ruan Minor
page.content: Employment varies a lot around Ruan Minor.When we asked the children in our school what their parents did for an occupation there was no one occupation that most people seemed to do.Many of the mothers were housewives though some would work in the summer because of the tourists.There were quite a few fathers who were connected with the building industry. There were also a few farmers and farmworkers. Some people work at Goonhilly which is an earth satellite station.There were a few parents who were unemployed. There is a small fishing industry at Cadgwith and some fathers were fishermen.A few people worked in shops.There are no big factories around because it is very isolated. The nearest city from here is about 25 miles away called Truro.
